dialog.page: Hello, what brings you to a moneylender today?

true.say: Johannes Gutenberg has sent me to humbly request you reconsider the loan offer.
true.page: And why is it that Mister Gutenberg, his greatness, cannot grace the bank with his presence?
Sending a messenger in his stead?
true.say: Mister Gutenberg feels too much shame to come before you.
He offers a set of playing cards hot off the press.

page.color: [The printed cards have been removed from your inventory]

true.page: The Master of Playing Cards made another set!
Mister Gutenberg knows I'm an avid collecter of these cards...
... Mister Gutenberg has demonstrated his aptitude.
Although Mister Gutenberg has been in some financial trouble before, if he continues to print more like these cards, I can see a profit in his future.
Tell him that I will give him the loan tomorrow. I will be by around noon to talk about the details.
I want to hear more about this “printing press” of his.

false.say: Nothing. I was just looking around.
